summary: Implemented a new per-symbol tick row component and updated WatchlistPriceTicks to render a live list driven by a symbols prop; Dashboard now passes a deterministic supported symbol list (BTC/ETH/XRP). One acceptance criterion appears only partially met: error messaging is shown per-row rather than clearly at the card level.

missing_requirements.requirement: If useGetLiveMarketData returns an error (including cycle exhaustion errors), the component shows a clear English error message in the card without crashing the page.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows error messaging rendered inside each WatchlistPriceTickRow (e.g., 'Service unavailable' / 'Error loading'), but WatchlistPriceTicks itself does not display a card-level error message when errors occur. The requirement/AC explicitly calls for an error message "in the card".

hallucinated_features.description: Added 24h change indicator with up/down trend icons and color styling in the watchlist live tick rows.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-26 only requires symbol label, formatted current price (USD), and loading state per row. Displaying 24h change and trend icons is additional UI not requested.
